ModMetaData.name: Gene Scaled Weapons
ModMetaData.author: celphcs30
ModMetaData.description:
Scales held equipment (weapons and other handheld items) based on the pawn's Vanilla Expanded Framework cosmetic body size multiplier.
Bigger pawns get bigger weapons, smaller pawns get smaller weapons. The scaling uses a softened power curve (VEF^0.5) to prevent extreme sizes while maintaining visual proportionality.
[h1]Features[/h1] [list] [*] Automatic weapon scaling based on pawn body size [*] Softened power curve prevents extreme scaling [*] RimDark 40k weapons are automatically blacklisted (already correctly scaled) [*] Configurable settings for ranged/melee weapons [/list]
[h1]Requirements[/h1] Requires Vanilla Expanded Framework for the VEF_CosmeticBodySize_Multiplier stat. Works with RimWorld 1.6+.
